short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase playback rate up to 16x, boost the audio, adjust both the brightness and contrast and add various filters to your video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your video with various useful and helpful options and filters.

Features:
- Adjust the playback rate of the video from 0.1x to 16x
- Boost the audio up to 10x
- Increase brightness up to 5x
- Increase contrast up to 5x
- Add and adjust up to 7 different filters to your video
- Toggle Picture-in-Picture(PiP) mode
- Customize the colors of the extension

Available filters:
- Blur
- Grayscale
- Hue Rotate
- Invert
- Opacity
- Saturate
- Sepia

Version 1.1.0 change log:
- Now you can adjust the filter values more precisely with the mouse wheel
- Added the option to not reset filters on video change
- Added the option to customize the colors of the extension

Version 1.2.0 change log:
- Added the option to toggle Picture-in-Picture(PiP) mode
